text: Oh, welcome! Are you new to GoonBlock?
Great! Let's get you started with the mod. I'll guide you through everything!

name: Goony
text: So, for starters, my name is Gwendolyn Octavia... or you could just call me Goony...

name: Goony
text: GoonBlock will improve your skyblock experience like no mod ever has before. Just imagine it: 5 more harp songs to suffer through, and...

name: Goony
text: Well... maybe I shouldn't spoil it.

name: Goony
text: How the mod is now, everything but the really insane stuff is enabled. To change this, use /goon to change your config.
